title: Patch Notes
content:
both sides of a split screen game even if it's just one player levelling up. Fixed a bug causing Orin's dagger to turn solid red. Fixed a bug where body type 1 and 3 characters' chests would clip through their armour in the spectral preview that appears when preparing to cast certain spells.

Updated the spell and condition tooltips for Owlbear's Rage to account for the Constitution and Temporary Hit Points gained when using the ability. Made the description of Mage Hand Legerdemain more accurat
